title: For the areas falling in zones, other than residential, commercial and (1) U zone as per the sanctioned Regional Plan (1) or Development Plan, as the case may be, the Project Proponent/s shall have to pay a premium for permitting project in such zones at the rates prescribed below in Table No
clause_text: For the areas falling in zones, other than residential, commercial and (1) U zone as per the sanctioned Regional Plan (1) or Development Plan, as the case may be, the Project Proponent/s shall have to pay a premium for permitting project in such zones at the rates prescribed below in Table No.14-A (1) This provision only applicable to new ITPs in Development Plan Areas. :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
